EmailTemplate.description: HAE: When a case status is changed to 'Closed' by System automation.
EmailTemplate.name: HAE Automated Case Closed Notification To Web Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Case [{!Case.CaseNumber}] has been Closed.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName},
The case with Case Number [{!Case.CaseNumber}] has been closed since there was no response for the past 5 days. In case you want to reopen a case please drop an email to the customer services team
Thanks,
Customer Services Team,
Haemonetics Corporation
